verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician אַל־ תַּשְׁחֵ֗ת <WH516> Altaschith לְדָוִ֥ד <WH1732> of David מִכְתָּֽם׃ <WH4387> Michtam הַֽאֻמְנָ֗ם <WH552> Do ye indeed אֵ֣לֶם <WH482> congregation צֶ֭דֶק <WH6664> righteousness תְּדַבֵּר֑וּן <WH1696> speak מֵישָׁרִ֥ים <WH4339> uprightly תִּ֝שְׁפְּט֗וּ <WH8199> avenge בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> O ye sons אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> man

אַף־ <WH637> No בְּלֵב֮ <WH3820> Yea in heart עוֹלֹ֪ת <WH5766> wickedness תִּפְעָ֫ל֥וּן <WH6466> ye work בָּאָ֡רֶץ <WH776> in the earth חֲמַ֥ס <WH2555> the violence יְ֝דֵיכֶ֗ם <WH3027> of your hands תְּפַלֵּֽסֽוּן׃ <WH6424> ye weigh

זֹ֣רוּ <WH2114> are estranged רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> The wicked מֵרָ֑חֶם <WH7358> from the womb תָּע֥וּ <WH8582> they go astray מִ֝בֶּ֗טֶן <WH990> as soon as they be born דֹּבְרֵ֥י <WH1696> speaking כָזָֽב׃ <WH3577> lies

חֲמַת־ <WH2534> Their poison לָ֗מוֹ כִּדְמ֥וּת <WH1823> [is] like חֲמַת־ <WH2534> the poison נָחָ֑שׁ <WH5175> of a serpent כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> Like פֶ֥תֶן <WH6620> adder חֵ֝רֵ֗שׁ <WH2795> [they are] like the deaf יַאְטֵ֥ם <WH331> [that] stoppeth אָזְנֽוֹ׃ <WH241> her ear

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> So לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יִ֭שְׁמַע <WH8085> Which will not hearken לְק֣וֹל <WH6963> to the voice מְלַחֲשִׁ֑ים <WH3907> of charmers חוֹבֵ֖ר <WH2266> caster חֲבָרִ֣ים <WH2267> of spells מְחֻכָּֽם׃ <WH2449> never so wisely

אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> O God הֲרָס־ <WH2040> Break שִׁנֵּ֥ימוֹ <WH8127> their teeth בְּפִ֑ימוֹ <WH6310> in their mouth מַלְתְּע֥וֹת <WH4459> the great teeth כְּ֝פִירִ֗ים <WH3715> of the young lions נְתֹ֣ץ ׀ <WH5422> break out יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> O LORD

יִמָּאֲס֣וּ <WH3988> Let them melt away כְמוֹ־ <WH3644> like מַ֭יִם <WH4325> as waters יִתְהַלְּכוּ־ <WH1980> [which] run continually לָ֑מוֹ יִדְרֹ֥ךְ <WH1869> [when] he bendeth [חִצֹּו כ] (חִ֝צָּ֗יו <WH2671> archer ק) כְּמ֣וֹ <WH3644> like יִתְמֹלָֽלוּ׃ <WH4135> let them be as cut in pieces

כְּמ֣וֹ <WH3644> as שַׁ֭בְּלוּל <WH7642> As a snail תֶּ֣מֶס <WH8557> [which] melteth יַהֲלֹ֑ךְ <WH1980> let [every one of them] pass away נֵ֥פֶל <WH5309> [like] the untimely birth אֵ֝֗שֶׁת <WH802> of a woman בַּל־ <WH1077> never חָ֥זוּ <WH2372> [that] they may not see שָֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> the sun

בְּטֶ֤רֶם <WH2962> Before יָבִ֣ינוּ <WH995> can feel סִּֽירֹתֵיכֶ֣ם <WH5518> Before your pots אָטָ֑ד <WH329> the thorns כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> alike חַ֥י <WH2416> both living כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> alike חָ֝ר֗וֹן <WH2740> and in [his] wrath יִשְׂעָרֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH8175> he shall take them away as with a whirlwind

יִשְׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> shall rejoice צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> The righteous כִּי־ <WH3588> when חָזָ֣ה <WH2372> when he seeth נָקָ֑ם <WH5359> the vengeance פְּעָמָ֥יו <WH6471> his feet יִ֝רְחַ֗ץ <WH7364> he shall wash בְּדַ֣ם <WH1818> in the blood הָרָשָֽׁע׃ <WH7563> of the wicked

וְיֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> shall say אָ֭דָם <WH120> So that a man אַךְ־ <WH389> Surely פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> Verily [there is] a reward לַצַּדִּ֑יק <WH6662> for the righteous אַ֥ךְ <WH389> Surely יֵשׁ־ <WH3426> verily he is אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> a God שֹׁפְטִ֥ים <WH8199> that judgeth בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the earth
